name: Simple exit popup
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
Simple exit pop up plugin that uses jQuery and the Animate style library to display the pop up box when users try to exit the browser window or web page. This type of pop up box is very popular these days. This pop up window is triggered when the user moves his mouse outside and the top of the browser window, indicate he is about to leave the page.

Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2020/06/20/simple-exit-popup-wordpress-plugin/

  • Live Demo : Live Demo
  • More Information : More Information
  • Plugin : Plugin URI

Plugin features

  • Supports all major browsers.
  • Responsive width.
  • Over 25+pop up animation effects.
  • Frequency control using cookies (every time or once per session).
  • Option to set delay after the page loads.
  • Custom style option.
  • Mobile friendly.
sections.installation:
Install Plugin using WordPress Plugin Search

Go to your WordPress admin area and click on Plugins >> Add New. Search Simple exit popup plugin using search option. Find the plugin and click Install Now link. Finally click activate plugin link to activate the plugin.

Simple exit popup

Install Plugin using the WordPress Admin Plugin Upload

Download the plugin simple-exit-popup.zip from download location. Go to Plugins >> Add New in your WordPress admin. Select upload plugin button. Upload the available simple-exit-popup.zip file and click Install Now. Finally click activate plugin link to activate the plugin.

Q6. Can i add a external file or URL in the popup content?
